Camera.Triple:: 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS 10 MP, f/2.4, (telephoto), 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom 12 MP, f/2.2, 123˚, 12mm (ultrawide), 1.12µm

Design.Build:: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus+) (folded), plastic front (unfolded), glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus+), aluminum frame
Design.SIM:: Up to two Nano SIM and one eSIM
Design.Others:: IPX8 water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins) Armour aluminum frame with tougher drop and scratch resistance (advertised) Stylus support
